Aim Esports

A growing esports organisation

Who we are?

Aim Esports India

Aim Esports is an esports organization which has been working for the betterment of esports community and scenario in India for the past 2 years. We provide daily scrims for all kinds of esports players (amateurs as well as pros). We have organized several esports events and tournaments in the recent times. We organize daily T3, T2, T1s and veterans for underdogs on daily basis from the last 2 years, also, we have organized several invitational events where many popular teams like BI officials, 1Shot Esports, Arsi gaming, Pandapup, BandookBaaz and many more popular players and teams have played. We provide esports players with a platform where they can grind for tournaments by providing them with a healthy gaming environment as well as good gaming exposure through our discord server. Our discord server had 19000 members till the last month, before it was hacked and eventually deleted, we have created a fresh new server last month, and we have gained approximately 3500+ members over the last one month. Our discord server currently stands with 3.7k+ members and we hope to get growing at a good speed again.
